explains: adj. 三维的；立体的；真实的

sentences.en: Think of a three-dimensional spherical black hole that's copied and stacked out in one direction to create an oblong shape.
sentences.cn: 设想一个三维的球状黑洞，把它复制和堆放在一个方向上，就会构成一个长方形的形状。

sentences.en: The software generates both two-dimensional drawings and three-dimensional images.
sentences.cn: 这种软件既能生成二维图形也能生成三维图像。
